info.title: ResourceManagementClient
info.description: Provides operations for working with resources and resource groups.

post.summary: Invokes a batch of individual Azure Resource Manager requests at a subscription scope.
post.description: The batch API can be used to invoke multiple Azure Resource Manager requests at once. Batches are processed asynchronously and allow for more efficient handling of many concurrent requests.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Specifications for all of the requests that will be invoked as part of the batch.

202.description: The batch was accepted and has begun processing.

Location.description: URL to get status of this long-running operation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: URL to get status of this long-running operation.

200.description: OK - Returns response details for all requests in the batch.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.summary: Invokes a batch of individual Azure Resource Manager requests at a resource group scope.
post.description: The batch API can be used to invoke multiple Azure Resource Manager requests at once. Batches are processed asynchronously and allow for more efficient handling of many concurrent requests.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Specifications for all of the requests that will be invoked as part of the batch.

202.description: The batch was accepted and has begun processing.

Location.description: URL to get status of this long-running operation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: URL to get status of this long-running operation.

200.description: OK - Returns response details for all requests in the batch.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

requests.description: The requests that will be invoked.

BatchRequests.description: Specifications for all of the requests that will be invoked as part of the batch.

id.description: The identifier for the request. Must be unique within a batch.

method.description: The HTTP method associated with the request.

headers.description: Headers that are specific to the request.

body.description: The body of the request. Not allowed for requests with an method of GET or DELETE.

BatchRequest.description: The specification for one request that will be part of a larger batch.

result.description: The final result of the batch operation.

nextLink.description: If present, a GET on this URL will return the next page of results.

BatchResponseStatus.description: The result of the batch operation and each request within it.

responses.description: Responses for all requests contained in the batch.

id.description: The identifier of the request that generated the response.

httpStatusCode.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

status.description: The status of the batch request. The request is complete when the status is set to Succeeded, Failed, or Canceled.

headers.description: Headers that are specific to this response.

BatchResponse.description: The response received for one request in the batch.

CloudError.description: An error response for a resource management request.
